document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">Sunset </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">stopped </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">on </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e088ff">Cottages </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Where </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">Sunset </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">hence </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">must </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">For </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">treason </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">His, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">but </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">Life's, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Gone </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">Westerly, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">Today </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">Sunset </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">stopped </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">on </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e088ff">Cottages </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Where </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">Morning </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">just </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">begun </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">What </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">difference, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">after </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">all, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Thou </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">mak'st </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Thou </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">Supercilious </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">Sun? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: The sunset stopped on cottages
